title: Mixed Paradigm-Based Mobile Mathematics Application Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical computation skills and work-related mathematics application experience
context.additional_context: Blended operations combining smartphone-based learning modules with offline practical sessions

learning_goals: Learners must solve real-world mathematical problems by combining structured algorithms (objectivism) and problem-solving strategies (constructivism).
Learners must accurately analyze over 80% of mathematical concept applications using 5-minute microlearning content in mobile environments.
Learners must propose improved mathematical models incorporating peer feedback through team-based practical assignments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
